title: Binomial Coefficient Calculation
description: This function calculates the binomial coefficient (n choose k), which is the number of ways to choose k elements from a set of n elements. It includes optimizations for specific cases, such as when k is 0 or equal to n.
name: BINOM

input.name: N
input.description: The total number of elements from which the selection is made.

input.name: K
input.description: The number of elements to choose from the total elements.
